mapper.insert: insert into tbl_noticeboard (noWriter, noTitle, noContent,noticeRead) VALUES (#{noWriter},#{noTitle},#{noContent},#{noticeRead});
mapper.select: (select noNo,noTitle,noWriter,regDate,noDelFlag,noticeRead from tbl_noticeboard as a where noticeRead = 1 and noDelFlag != 1 order by noNo desc limit 5) union (select noNo,noTitle,noWriter,regDate,noDelFlag,noticeRead from tbl_noticeboard as b where noticeRead = 0 and noDelFlag != 1 order by noNo desc) limit #{skip}, #{size};
select count(*) from tbl_noticeboard where noticeRead = 0 and noDelFlag != 1
